resources.string:
Sir M.Visvesvaraya Institute of Technology, Bengaluru has been conducting Kalanjali an annual inter-collegiate Techno-Cultural Fest successfully since the year 1996.


		Kalanjali has been setting the stage for the student community to show their talent, innovation and creativity with zeal and zest. Kalanjali 2015 is scheduled to be held on 30th and 31st October 2015.

VENUE : Old Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.300
2.	Duration is 12+3 min
3.	Maximum of 6 singers are allowed in a group with 4 accompanists
4.	Team has to present 3 songs
5.	Song should be either in Kannada or Hindi
6.	Evaluation is based on singing only not on makeup, costumes or actions of the team
7.	Karaoke not allowed

VENUE : CS Seminar Hall 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.Duration is 5+2 min3.	Evaluation is based on Composition, Rhythm, Coordination and General Impression
4.	Participants shall bring their own instruments
5.	Only 2 accompanists are allowed
6.	Language of the song shall only be English
7.	Karaoke not allowed

VENUE : New Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.300
2.	Duration is 6+4 min
3.	Group can consist of 6+6 members
4.	Dance can be filmy or western style
5.	Recorded music is allowed
6.	Evaluation will be based on rhythm, formation, expression, costume, makeup, sets and overall effects

VENUE : Dental Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 8+4 min
3.	The classical dance can be from any of the approved forms such as Kathak, Kathakkali, Bharathanatyam, Manipuri, Kuchipudi, Mohiniyattam, Odissi, etc.
4.	Recorded Music is allowed
5.	Evaluation will be based on technique, rhythm, abhinaya, costume, footwork and general impression

VENUE : New Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 5+2 min
3.	Only filmy dance is allowed in this item
4.	Recorded music is allowed
5.	Evaluation will be based on technique, rhythm, abhinaya, costume, footwork and general impression

VENUE : New Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.1000
2.	One Team per college
3.	Minimum number of participants per team is 10 and Maximum is 14. In addition there maybe one person incharge of music and one for lights
4.	Stage time for each team is limited to maximum of 8+2 min. 2 min for stage setting is permitted
5.	Only one round is allowed
6.	Teams will be judged on creativity, adherence to the theme, styling, choreography and music
7.	Any form of obscenity will result in debarring the team from further participation
8.	Theme: Theme of your Choice (Open theme)
9.	 Prize:
						1st Prize: Rs.18,000
						2nd Prize: Rs.8,000

VENUE : Ground 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.150 per team
2.	Each team will contain a maximum of 8 players (5 on field + 3 substitutes)
3.	Game Time: Approx. 15 min (7 min each half)
4.	A goalless match will result in a penalty shoot-out with 5-members taking one penalty each(One step penalty from the spot)
5.	Only underarm throw allowed to goal keeper. If now followed 2 warnings will be given and the third will result in a penalty to the opposite team
6.	Every out results in a kick in
7.	If any player is given a red card, he will not be allowed to continue playing and team plays with a player short
8.	Failure to report on time results in a walkover to opposite team\m9.	REFEREE'S DECISION IS FINAL

VENUE : New Block Side Entrance 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.300
2.	Duration is 10+2 min
3.	Team can consist of 10+2 members
4.	Play can be in English, Hindi or Kannada
5.	No props allowed other than dupattas, head\wrist bands, kanjira
6.	No pre-recorded music allowed
7.	General rules of street play are applicable

VENUE : New Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 6+2 min
3.	Only filmy dance is allowed in this item
4.	Recorded music is allowed
5.	Evaluation will be based on technique, rhythm, abhinaya, costume, footwork and general impression

VENUE : Dental Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 10+5 min
3.	Items can be hindustani or Carnatic
4.	Film songs are not allowed
5.	Evaluation is based on the qualities like Shruthi,Raaga,Composition and General Impression
6.	Only 2 accompanists are allowed
7.	Electronic Shruthi box or Tabla box are allowed

VENUE : Faraday Seminar Hall (EEE 2nd Floor) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.

VENUE : MBA Seminar Hall (V Block) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.
2.	Maximum of 4 members per team
3.	There are 2 rounds
4.	First round is the elimination round which consists of MCQS.
			Areas: New technologies, tech terms, people in news etc.
5.	Duration: 40 min
6.	Second round is quiz round (4 rounds in total)

VENUE : CS Seminar Hall 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.Duration is 4+2 min
3.	Evaluation is based on Composition, Rhythm, Coordination and General Impression
4.	Participants shall bring their own instruments
5.	Only 2 accompanists are allowed
6.	Language of the song shall only be English
7.	Karaoke not allowed

VENUE : New Block Side Entrance 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Maximum 24 megapixel camera
3.	No editing
4.	Instructions and theme will be given on spot

VENUE : Marconi Seminar Hall (NB 2nd Floor) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.

VENUE : Science Seminar Hall (Science Block) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 4+1 min
3.	Participants can speak 'for' or 'against' the topic
4.	Medium of expression will be English, Kannada or Hindi
5.	Paper reading is not allowed
6.	Topic for the competition will be announced 24 hours prior to the start of the program(For topic confirmation contact student convenor)

VENUE : Workshop 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 2 hours
3.	Participants will bring their own materials. The art is known differently in different regions such as Mandna, Alpana, Alekhan, Rangoli etc.
4.	For this, the medium and form of expression can be free hand, pictorial or descriptive
5.	Only one medium shall be used: Color Powder or flower petals or saw dust or rice without pasting
6.	The participants will have to prepare a rangoli within the space provided by the organizers

VENUE : Dental Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 8+4 min
3.	The classical dance can be from any of the approved forms such as Kathak, Kathakkali, Bharathanatyam, Manipuri, Kuchipudi, Mohiniyattam, Odissi, etc.
4.	Recorded Music is allowed
5.	Evaluation will be based on technique, rhythm, abhinaya, costume, footwork and general impression
6.	Hazardous elements like fire,smoke are to be avoided

VENUE : Old Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.
2.	Duration is 6+4 min
3.	Only English songs allowed
4.	Four singers + Five accompanists are allowed
5.	Participants need to bring their own instruments

VENUE : CS Seminar Hall 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 1 min
3.	Participants will be given a topic on spot
4.	Grammatical errors, unnecessary pause, jumbled words will be considered as errors and participants who point out any of these will be given a chance to speak next

VENUE : New Block Side Entrance 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.300
2.	Duration is 10+2 min
3.	Team can consist of 8+2 members
4.	Play can be in English, Hindi or Kannada
5.	No props allowed other than dupattas, head\wrist bands, kanjira
6.	No pre-recorded music allowed
7.	General rules of street play are applicable

VENUE : Marconi Seminar Hall (NB 2nd Floor) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	A list of words will be given a day before the competition
3.	Participants have to compose their own poem using as many of the listed words and recite it

VENUE : Workshop 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 2 hours
3.	Theme for the event will be provided on spot
4.	The college will provide the Drawing paper
5.	Participants will bring their pasting and other materials required for the contest
6.	A collage has to be prepared from old magazines or news papers
7.	Team can have maximum of 2 participants

VENUE : New Block (007A) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Two Participants per team
3.	First round consists of MCQ’s. This is an elimination round. Duration is 30 minutes
4.	Second round is the coding round which will consist of 5\-6 questions. Duration for this round will be 90 minutes

VENUE : Ground 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.150 per team
2.	Each team will contain a maximum of 8 players (5 on field + 3 substitutes)
3.	Game Time: Approx. 15 min (7 min each half)
4.	A goalless match will result in a penalty shoot-out with 5-members taking one penalty each(One step penalty from the spot)
5.	Only underarm throw allowed to goal keeper. If now followed 2 warnings will be given and the third will result in a penalty to the opposite team
6.	Every out results in a kick in
7.	If any player is given a red card, he will not be allowed to continue playing and team plays with a player short
8.	Failure to report on time results in a walkover to opposite team\m9.	REFEREE'S DECISION IS FINAL

VENUE : New Block (107A) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.300
2.	Event Type: Group Event (5 per team)
3.	Game Version: Counter Strike 1.6
4.	The Maps and event draw will be announced before the start of the event
5.	Server Settings are standard WCG settings

VENUE : New Block (107A) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Event Type: Individual Event
3.	Four Participants will be competing in the preliminary round
4.	Only sprints and circuits will be conducted
5.	Winners of each round will proceed to the next round until finals are conducted

VENUE : New Block (107A) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Event Type: Individual Event
3.	The game is 1v1, time limit:4 min
4.	Standard rules apply

VENUE : New Block 


We Exhibit the finest art works of Sir MVIT

VENUE : New Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Maximum of 2 members per team
3.	Medium of conduction: Hindi
4.	Written prelims followed by finals
5.	Rules for each round will be announced during the event by the coordinators
6.	Decision of the judges will be final and binding

VENUE : New Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Maximum of 2 members per team
3.	Medium of conduction: Kannada
4.	Written prelims followed by finals
5.	Rules for each round will be announced during the event by the coordinators
6.	Decision of the judges will be final and binding

VENUE : Dental Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 4+2 min
3.	Two accompanists are allowed
4.	Karaoke not allowed

VENUE : Dental Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 4+2 min
3.	Filmy songs are not allowed in this item
4.	Only non-filmy songs/bhavageete, ghazal, bhajan/shabad, Vachana and abhangs are allowed
5.	Electronic Shruthi box or Tabla box are allowed

VENUE : MBA Seminar Hall (V Block) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 8+2 min
3.	Participants shall bring their own instruments
4.	Only 2 accompanists are allowed (Eg. Harmonium for Tabala)
5.	Item can be Hindustani or Carnatic
6.	Evaluation is based on the qualities like Shruthi,Raaga,Composition and General Impression

VENUE : MBA Seminar Hall (V Block) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 8+2 min
3.	Participants shall bring their own instruments
4.	Only 2 accompanists are allowed (Eg. Harmonium for Tabala)
5.	Item can be Hindustani or Carnatic
6.	Evaluation is based on the qualities like Shruthi,Raaga,Composition and General Impression
7.	Casio is not allowed

VENUE : CS Seminar Hall 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 6+2 min
3.	Skit can be in English, Hindi or Kannada
4.	The event will be judged based on the qualities like theme, acting, creativity, makeup, music and general impression

VENUE : BT Seminar Hall (V Block) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Two Participants per team
3.	The event consists of a preliminary round(written) and the team will be shortlisted for final round (oral)
4.	The specific rules regarding the evaluation procedure, time to a give a particular answer an type of round will be informed before the commencement of the event
5.	Question will be based on general topics, technical, scientific, and current technologies

VENUE : Marconi Seminar Hall (NB 2nd Floor) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.
2.	Team must consist of 2 members per team
3.	Teams are expected to make items based on what is given to them on spot

VENUE : Science Seminar Hall (Science Block) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.
2.	Total of three rounds
3.	15 min 20 questions for aptitude test
4.	Round 2 will consist of a group discussion
5.	Round 3 will be the stress interview

VENUE : Civil Drawing Room 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 2 hours
3.	Event will be conducted on spot on the given subject or idea
4.	Participants will bring their own materials
5.	Drawing paper will be provided

VENUE : Old Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.300
2.	Duration is 12+5 min
3.	Maximum of 6 singers are allowed in a group
4.	Only 3 accompanists are allowed
5.	Team has to present 3 songs; One Solo, One Duet and One group song
6.	Song should be either in Kannada or Hindi
7.	Evaluation is based on singing only not on makeup, costumes or actions of the team
7.	Karaoke not allowed

VENUE : Faraday Seminar Hall (EEE 2nd Floor) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Three members per team
3.	No lip-sync allowed
4.	Referring through colors, names, objects etc. are not allowed
5.	Should not break a word more than once

VENUE : CS Seminar Hall 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.
2.	The team may consist of 9+3 members
3.	Duration is 20+10 min
4.	Teams must bring their own sets and stage property, makeup material etc
5.	Play may be in English/hindi/kannada

VENUE : Marconi Seminar Hall (NB 2nd Floor) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.
2.	15 min prep time to research the personality
3.	The panel will be given 5+2 minutes to grill the participants

VENUE : Civil Drawing Room 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.100
2.	Duration is 2 hours
3.	Event will be conducted on the spot and participants will be requested to do painting on the subject given
4.	Painting can be done in oil, water, poster or pastel colors
5.	Candidates shall bring thier own materials like brushes, paint, etc. Only the paper or sheet will be provided by the college

VENUE : New Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.300
2.	Duration is 6+4 min
3.	Group can consist of 7+5 members
4.	Dance can be filmy, contemporary or western style
5.	Recorded music is allowed
6.	Evaluation will be based on rhythm, formation, expression, costume, makeup, sets and overall effects

VENUE : Faraday Seminar Hall (EEE 2nd Floor) 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.
2.	Duration will not be more than 2 hours
3.	Theme will be given on spot
4.	Participants need to bring their own material. Only the drawing paper/sheet 22”X15” will be provided by the organizers

VENUE : CS Seminar Hall 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.
2.	Duration is 6+2 min
3.	Teams can consist of 8 + 2 members
4.	Evaluation is based on the theme, acting, creativity, makeup, music and general impression, props are not allowed

VENUE : New Auditorium 


RULES:

1.	Registration Fee: Rs.1000
2.	One Team per college
3.	Minimum number of participants per team is 10 and Maximum is 14. In addition there maybe one person in charge of music and one for lights
4.	Stage time for each team is limited to maximum of 8+2 min. 2 min for stage setting is permitted
5.	Only one round is allowed
6.	Teams will be judged on creativity, adherence to the theme, styling, choreography and music
7.	Any form of obscenity will result in debarring the team from further participation
8.	Theme: Theme of your Choice (Open theme)
9.	 Prize:
						1st Prize: Rs.18,000
						2nd Prize: Rs.8,000
